# objectForm

**Instance Property**

The object pronoun form to apply when using this custom pronoun behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
var objectForm: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

In the English phrase “ask him,” the pronoun “him” exhibits the object form.

## Determining Pronoun Forms

- **subjectForm**: The subject pronoun form to apply when using this custom pronoun behavior.
- **possessiveForm**: The posessive pronoun form to apply when using this custom pronoun behavior.
- **possessiveAdjectiveForm**: The posessive adjective pronoun form to apply when using this custom pronoun behavior.
- **reflexiveForm**: The reflexive pronoun form to apply when using this custom pronoun behavior.
